text.section:
Each taxicab for which a permit is required shall have:
the name of the taxicab permit holder of the taxicab permanently painted or affixed on one door on each side of the taxicab, in letters at least 2.5 inches high; and
the word "taxicab" appear conspicuously on the taxicab.

section.section:
The Commission shall:
determine the form and style of a badge; and
issue to each licensed taxicab driver a badge with the taxicab driver's license number on the badge.
A licensed taxicab driver shall display the badge conspicuously in the interior of a taxicab whenever operating the taxicab.
